__e: Lucien's got no reason to be on the lookout for me.
Logically, then, one must assume that Lucien has it or he knows where it is.

I came to offer you a gift, maybe in exchange for one of our little chats of which I'm in particular need, given as my brother doesn't bother to answer my calls, and now my old mate Lucien has swanned into town
You, Lucien, the rest of you.
Lucien and me, we are like that.
And of Lucien and Louis it may be fairly said that theirs was a most special destiny.
My guys stayed on Tristan's trail, followed him to a secret storehouse, and you'll never guess who just bought that storehouse.
And we were, until our Ancestors, they came along, and they made a deal with the Devil, in the form of Lucien Castle.
Why don't you ask the Ancestors why they trust Lucien Castle, a vampire who's done nothing but lie and kill ever since he set foot in New Orleans.
Lucien is a means to their ends, and they won't let anyone stand in their way.
Oh, I'm quite certain Lucien's aware, devastating error.
Aurora will always protect Tristan, and, given that he and Lucien are aligned, the 3 of them together have a distinct advantage, unless... unless we break that advantage.
